Name: Boat Simulator Apprentice
About the game: Welcome to the simulator-arcade experience. Boat Simulator Apprentice is a small boat training game that caters to both simulator fans and arcade game lovers. Introducing Daniel, your trainer. Daniel has created several increasingly difficult training modules to teach you how to drive a boat. With the help of Daniel, you'll be exposed to the common basic boat controls and scenarios. In some instances, Daniel shall change the setup of the simulator environment to create scenarios for you to master. Features: Simulator Mode: Structured learning on basic practices of driving a boat Arcade Mode: Boat Sprint, Time Trials, Rescue Missions, Treasure Hunt Planed Features: Level Editor COLREGS-based rules of the road or navigations rules Story Mode Open-world Roaming
